    • getMaxNumberOfWordInASentence

      public int getMaxNumberOfWordInASentence()
      The maximum number of words in sentences. This is used to improve the performance of the algorithm. If a sentence in the text is bigger than this number, the algorithm will translate it word by word, rather then recursively translate the phrases
      Returns:

    • setMaxNumberOfWordInASentence

      public void setMaxNumberOfWordInASentence​(int maxNumberOfWordInASentence)
      The maximum number of words in sentences. This is used to improve the performance of the algorithm. If a sentence in the text is bigger than this number, the algorithm will translate it word by word, rather then recursively translate the phrases
      Parameters:
      maxNumberOfWordInASentence -

    • translateText

      public java.lang.String translateText​(java.lang.String text)
      Translates the given text. Splits the text into sentences and uses the sentenseTranslation recursive algorithm to smartly translate each one. Uses streams and paralelization to translate each sentence simultaneously.
      Parameters:
      text - to translate

    • translateFile

      public java.lang.String translateFile​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Translates the given file and returns the translation as a string
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to translate
      Returns:
      String the translated string
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception
